commit message: Updated to start V3.7. Also made minimum APK = 8
Use onBackPressed instead of onKeyUp
Use a batch of ContentProviderOperations to save a Play. Some other refactoring.
Fix bug in PlayPersister, change the log tag prefix, relocate some utility methods
Use ContentProviderOperation on all handlers
Refactoring BggDatabase to use CreateTableBuilder everywhere and create with cascading deletes
Refactor BggDatabase and fix bug in TableBuilder
Fix bug parsing game polls; with some refactoring
Remove the deleteChildren method - cascading delete takes care of this now
Upgrade the database to use cascading deletes; correct the parsing of collection items; refactor to use the base CPO methods
Fix a formatting error in About.html
For buddy avatars, instead of the image cache, use the content provider
Collection thumbnails now using the content provider
Refactor some of the new image caching code
Finish converting thumbnail access to the content provider
Refactor the openFile method in the ContentProvider
Finish refactoring the soon-to-be-old image cache. Delete the old cache location on upgrade
Change target to Android 4.1 API16, add the support library and a version utils class
Address many of the compiler warnings (mostly deprecations)
Rename ImageCache to ImageUtils
Add ActionBarSherlock
Apply ActionBar to Home and About.

Add Search back to the HomeActivity
Move Refresh to the ActionBar
Fix a bug in the SearchSuggestProvider
Externalize a string in PlayCountSortData
Create a dashboard fragment separate from the home activity
BuddiesActivity - add action bar and create a fragment
Move intent to fragment methods to UIUtils; remove unused layout
Fix BuddiesFragment loading without specifying the URI. Some refactoring.
BuddyActivity is now fragmented
Load the right layout for BuddyActivity. Fix up the search action.
Add the avatar back to the BuddyActivity, adding the new image caching code
Add images to BuddiesFragment. Shore up some gaps in BuddiesFragment and ImageFetcher
Attempt to show sync status on home activity.
Add the ability to refresh the buddy list. Improve the loader updating.
Fragment the Hotness, and improve both image fetching and buddies loading
Save hot games on orientation change
Include the game's rank when retrieving the game
Get a basic new GameActivity going. Add resources and styles for action bar tabs.
Don't close the cursor on the BuddyFragment
Fix bug for pre-API11 in HotnessFragment
Map the _ID column to prevent queries from erroring
When inserting games child tables, get the game ID from the URI
Change the description to TextView instead of a WebView
Make the DashboardLayout better with an odd number of children
Handle data better in the BuddyFragment

Correct queries against games and colletion while joining game_ranks
Correct inserting GamesIdRankProvider
Correct rowExists method
Improve logging of SelectionBuilder
Fix more bad joins
Add a bunch more info on the game info fragment
One more attempt to fix syncing errors
Fix one more parsing bug and apply changes after each game (not each page). A bit of refactoring.
Add POLLS_COUNT to the Games contract. Make sure queried URIs are getting registered with observers.
Added ability to refresh - manually and automatically.
Hook up the log play menu items to the new GameActivity

Move width and height from styles to layouts
Fix artist, designer, etc. list width
Add links section (pretty ugly, but works)
Try to launch a new ImageActivity (there's a problem retrieving it from the disk cache)
Attempt to fix launching a shortcut

Some cleanup work, including:
Delete unused files
Rename IDs
Show a loading message
Improve stats section in landscape
Hide individual list sections by default
Externalize some strings
Make game info lists expandable; add base games

Change the ColorsActivity to the ColorsFragment and hook it into the GameActivity.
Show the game name in the action bar title

Improve error handling in the Content Provider when accessing an image
Update release notes
Remove unused files

Correct GameActivity's fragment creation
Show help again
Clean up widget_expandable_list.xml
Delete unused GameInfoActivityTab
Make ExpandableListView save and restores instance state
Add an icon to the description and retain its state
Update Plays to be a fragment - works as a tab from a game and from the home activity

Change title of GameActivity to 'Game'
Fix incorrect text in preferences around player logging
Update the name of the game in the action bar when it's updated
Correct description expander icon when closed
Correct bad method name
Eliminate some trivial compiler warnings
Comments are now a fragment as a tab in the GameActivity. Also cleaned up a few strings
Fragmentize forums! (A little cleanup from comments as well)
Make the forum thread list fragmentized too; also remove some unused files.

Fragmentize forum thread
Move all forum keys to centralized class
Improve custom loaders
Fix some bad/old strings
Prevent error when navigating away from the Hotness before it finishes loading
Fixing FC error during navigation from Play to Game using thumbnail
Fragmentize polls while improving the query and the layout. Also shorten some unrelated titles.
Fix syncing of plays

Handle a couple of exceptions
Use a simpler version of getRelativeTimeSpan
Fragmentize PlayActivity. Also make some strings more generic and refactor a couple of features for better reuse
Update LogPlayerActivity (but not a fragment)
Update LogPlayActivity (but not a fragment), replace deprecated methods
Make list buttons clickable

Fragmentize search results
Make a BaseActivity
Remove some of the context menu options (sub menus are no longer allowed)
Buddy collection is now displayed
Allow clicking on designers, artists, and publishers, showing the description. Modify the sync service to sync one of these at a time.
Add buddy information back to be displayed on top of buddy collection
Fixing FC error during navigation from ImageActivity with use of home button
Clear a list in the game info fragment to avoid doubling up the list; a couple of unrelated, minor fixes
Make Collection a fragment
Remove a bunch of old code and files
Guard against missing URLs when attempting to load an image
Correct the progress bar styles

Correct text color in PollFragment
Show the correct thumbnail in CollectionFragment when image is missing
In PlayFragment, display the minutes suffix correctly
Prevent the bar chart from doubling the information
Make stats and links collapsible regions

Correct permissions and title of search results
Correct navigating up in all cases
Throw FileNotFoundException in openFile instead of returning null

Improve syncing of a single game
Begin work on sync a games plays (WIP)
Fix a bad reference in TextFragment

When a game's plays are updated, notify via the game URI
Keep track of when a game's plays have been updated
Forgot one file during the last refactor
Improve refresh icon; all play refresh to be triggered by action bar
Update ActionBarSherlock to V4.2.0
Remove a lot of unused code (mostly images) and make a new launcher icon
Change the player control to use the default button style for the device/OS
Refactor the blob providers, adding the ability to delete and access them directly
Delete Thumbnails and Avatars with the Clear option and when the image changes during a sync. (still need to delete if the game or buddy is removed)
Add a new light theme
A little cleanup
Change all icons to the action bar style and theme them
Clean up formatting and styles in all row_* layouts
Clean up the styles for the activity_* and dialog_* layouts, plus make the DualSliderView work on white backgrounds
Correct size of filter button when on newer versions of Android
Draw a border around the pie chart and the color key; make the highlight more visible on light backgrounds.
Finish auditing styles
Add refresh to PlaysActivity and refactor the way game-specific plays are queried
Add the ability to filter the list of plays by sync type
Logging a play is now a 2 step process: store it in the DB, then kick off a sync
Deleting plays now works again (and better).
Fix plays auto-syncing crash, remove old code, improve UI of PlayActivity, and refactoring
Update to API 17 and support library 11

Update About and Release Notes
Style the alert dialog icon properly
Remove specialized content notifiers (no longer necessary)
Only prompt to cancel while logging a player if something has changed
Improve (hopefully) collection syncing; add more logging; change the way the artists, designers, etc. are inserted; periodically save batches during collection sync in case of errors.
Correct datetime display on forums (for time zone). Rename public fields
More formatting improvements
Correct updating games without player info
Last bit of UI polishing for now.
Start using the Account Manager
Forget the method used to authenticate the user (missed a file)
Use the new account for auth and start to remove old way of auth.
Use the account everywhere, removing all references to the username/password stored in the preferences

Add icon from home screen to sign in (if not already)
Fix null reference error during XML parsing
Fix bug launching shortcuts
Update release notes
Move some tasks from SyncService to new UpdateService
Refactor the way plays are saved. Check if a play is modified on cancel. Save the play immediately to (hopefully) avoid multiple copies in progress
Begin moving sync service to SyncAdapter; remove reference to support library, we use the one from ActionBarSherlock
Refactoring of calling handlers from the UI.
Separate UpdateTask from SyncTask and handle exceptions in the former (rather than throwing them)
Remote XmlHandler and HandlerException
Hook new syncing up to the UI
Test for connectivity before syncing. Refactor SyncTasks to accept the account instead of the (redundant) context.
Sync now populates syncResult.stats; added permission to allow network state to be checked
Correctly store the play sync status on insert (was always 0).
Handle BGG being down as an IOException (it's a lot cleaner)
Move sync info from preferences to AccountManager; lots of refactoring
Don't automatically trigger a refresh when viewing the collection; refactor and remove old code.
Refactor syncing of buddies, including using the AccountManager to store last sync time
Improve play syncing
Use PlaysUrlBuilder everywhere; remove old SyncService
Rename SyncService2 to SyncService
Don't store game colors unless we already have the game in the DB (otherwise it causes a SQL constraint violation)
Missed a file when renaming SyncService2

Remove manifest reference to old service
Fix PlaysUrlBuilder to use the mindate correctly
GameUrlBuilder now defaults to the old API - the handler doesn't support the new one
Complete moving storage of sync progress from preferences to sync adapter
Add a notification to the sync service; adjust the playing notification to use the new icon and look more JB-appropriate
Change the logging level when a bitmap isn't found in the content provider (happens frequently and it expected)
Always pass the RemoteExecutor a context, but test if it's null. Use the exceptions localized message for display
Re-arrange a couple of menus and a couple of wording improvements
Rearrange and reword settings to be more in line with Android standards; fix subscreens that were black font on black background
Prevent deleting collection when getting an IOException

Make the sync notifcations display based on preferences
Exceptions during sync should display the message, not the entire description
Move most preferences to PreferencesUtils
Correctly compare players in Play.eqauls
Remove unused ImageFetcher overloads

Allow searching from the Quick Search Box again (permission issue)
Add shortcut to global search configuration from settings
Change wording around the global search
Update version description and release notes
Handle the situation where an external directory isn't there; reduce logging level when a bitmap can't be saved to the content provider
Fix format when game is unrated
Handle auth when the password expires
Comments are now working correctly (XMLAPI 2 has to be used, not 1)
Thumbnails are no longer displayed on buddy collection, but years are
Get the image activity workings (it helps if the view is visible!). Also added recent changes from the IOSched project
Prevent Plays and Colors context menus from stepping on each other
Lower the priority of the sync notification (but not the error). Stop tracking the number of inserts, updates, deletes, etc. - this was causing the sync adapter to appear to be running at all times
Pressing back while logging a play or player saves instead of cancels
Update BezelImageView to IOSched example which includes a focused and pressed version
Invert Log Play and Quick Log Play settings and hook them back up
Clean up and invert all log player settings
Clean up and invert all log play settings, add a new one for quantity
Improve the hiding/showing logic of quantity and length while logging a play. Hopefully eliminate having multiple edit forms open.
Change the completion threshold of player color to 1 (from the default of 2)

Bump version number to 4.0
Rearrange release notes
Clear the image view when the URL is missing (like when the collection is being downloaded)
Display buttons on the dashboard properly after signing in or out
Tagging version 4.0
